settings.title: How It Works
settings.content: HERE’S EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO KNOW ABOUT YOUR PRODUCTS

settings.title:
We believe that getting to know your pets better will allow you to

build a stronger bond with them.
Have you ever wondered what your cat is saying when ’meow’? What mood is your dog expressing when they ‘woof’?
settings.content:
Do you also think that there are times when we could better meet their needs if we could better understand them? As pet owners, we have the same concerns as you do.

We want to understand what our beloved one really needs so that we can take better care of them.

settings.title: We are on a mission to find out what is best for our fur pals, provide the problem-solving product for you and your pets, so that you can get to know each other further and live better together.
Design that matters, driven by love
settings.content:
We value the quality of life of our pets and believe they deserve the same attention as a beloved family member.

Design and innovation are two factors that drive us to improve our product performance. We believe that user-centered, functional and responsive design helps us improve the lives of our pets.

settings.title: Peace of heart, ease of mind
settings.content: We believe that pets deserve responsible, high-quality care and that their humans deserve an easier way to offer this to them. Our goal is to free you from the shackles of the pet care process so that you have time to spend on the fun interactions in your pet's life.

settings.title: This is just the beginning
settings.content:
Passionate in pets, we are just like other pet owners in your community. We know pets’ needs and you care for them. Our philosophy allows us to continue to provide the best service for you and your pet, and we are always
listening for continuous improvement. We would love to hear your advice, stay connected with us via hello@petlibro.com

settings.title: Shipping
settings.subtitle: DETAILS ABOUT WHERE AND HOW WE ARE SHIPPING PRODUCTS

settings.title: DELIVERY TIMES
settings.content:
All orders on Petlibro.com are shipped by USPS, UPS, or Amazon FBA. It generally takes 1-2 business days to process and dispatch orders from the warehouse. In peak periods like holidays or Black Friday & Cyber Monday please allow up to 5 business days for dispatch.

All orders are shipped from California & Pennsylvania depending on the proximity of your shipping address and our availability. This allows us to get your items out to you faster.

AREA
Contiguous United States
SHIPPING TIME
5 - 8 Business Days
SHIPPING FEE
  • Orders Over $50 - Free
  • Orders $30-$49.99 - $5.99
  • Orders $0-$29.99 - $3.99

settings.title: ORDER TRACKING
settings.content: Once your order has shipped, you will receive an Order Tracking Number (OTN) via email or text message. You can use the number to track the status of your shipment. If you haven't received your OTN in 5 business days, please contact us at help@petlibro.com and we’ll respond as early as possible.

settings.title: DELIVERY ADDRESS
settings.content:
A complete, correct delivery address is essential. Once your order has been processed or shipped, it won’t be able for us to change the shipping address. To change or cancel the order, please email help@petlibro.com within 8 hours after order is placed.

If a package is returned to us due to an incorrect or incomplete address provided by you (the customer) or your agent, we will contact you immediately for a correction, and the package will be re-shipped at an additional shipping fee.

settings.title: BACK ORDERS
settings.content: We ship the entire order when all items are ready, so please consider placing a separate order for your back-ordered items if you prefer not to wait on them for the rest of your items to ship.

settings.title: LOST/DAMAGED PACKAGES DUE TO SHIPPING
settings.content: If any item is lost or arrives damaged due to shipping, please snap some photos of the damage to the box and contact the carrier. We are not responsible for any errors made by the post office. However, if your package has not been received within 2 weeks of the shipping notification email or text message, please contact us. We will look into your order details and assist you in getting it straightened out with USPS. We will send you a new item.

settings.title: SHIPPING/ORDER QUESTIONS
settings.content: For any questions about shipping or your orders, please email our support team at help@petlibro.com.

settings.title: CARRIER PARTNERS
settings.bottomtext:
Note:

Due to the current COVID-19 pandemic, our couriers may experience delays in shipping and updating of information due to the restriction of shipping lines. Important medical supplies such as masks and medical equipment are being prioritized for shipment during this period. Please allow an additional 1-2 weeks for your order to be delivered after it has been processed. We will monitor all orders until completed. We thank you for your understanding during this difficult time.

Last updated: 30th June 2021
